title: His To Claim
description: One girl only ever brought Wealthy, Confident and Handsome Scot, Trevor McBain to his knees. And she hates him to his guts.Or does she?A night of passion and desire turns every dream Elaine Parker ever had of love and happiness with Trevor McBain into a fest of gory humiliation. Her pride saved her then. But now, her one mistake, one weak moment has threatened to betray her utterly. Bare her soul to him at a touch of fire. The pleasures of heaven his mouth promised are melting her resolve, forcing her to trust her heart in the hands of her destroyer once again.Attention:- Grab your copy today at a Special Pre-Order Price. Available at Kobo, Barnes and Noble, Apple, and Smashwords.
author: Sierra Jaid
